body_html:
I am using ### cuda9.0 and cudnn7.1.4 on Ubuntu16.04
and I installed caffe2 pre-build Binaries after I have installed cuda and cudnn by the command bellow:
conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7
I can run the script in my terminal by when I run the script from pycharm , I encountered the WARNING that you've met
I suggest that you should ### install and configure your cuda and cudnn correctly because I have met many errors when I tried to install caffe2 without config cuda and cudnn correctly
The correct version of cuda and cudnn may be the keypoint

body:
I am using **_### cuda9.0 and cudnn7.1.4 on Ubuntu16.04_**
and I installed caffe2 pre-build Binaries after I have installed cuda and cudnn by the command bellow:
conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7
I can run the script in my terminal by when I run the script from pycharm , I encountered the WARNING that you've met
I suggest that you should **_### install and configure your cuda and cudnn correctly_** because I have met many errors when I tried to install caffe2 without config cuda and cudnn correctly
The correct version of cuda and cudnn may be the keypoint
